name: Southern End of Sesame Street
description: The cheerful yellow bricks of Sesame Street begin here, creating a welcoming terminus adorned with a slightly faded welcome sign that cheerfully insists this is 'The Friendliest Street in America!' The exclamation point maintains unwavering optimism despite years of weather. The air smells of fresh-baked cookies and the kind of hope that refuses to acknowledge complexity. This is where the adventure properly begins.
